channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Bryan Kohberger to plead guilty to murder in Idaho student stabbings to avoid death penalty
item.description: Bryan Kohberger has agreed to plead guilty to murdering four University of Idaho students as part of a deal with prosecutors to avoid the death penalty.

item.title: Jury deliberating at Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ sex trafficking trial asks to review Cassie’s testimony
The man accused of killing 2 Idaho firefighters had once aspired to be one
